sentences.sContent: ...the owner of the greenhouse where I worked as manager died of a heart attack...
...total energy use and greenhouse gas emissions mainly...
...I had worked out an agreement to lease the greenhouse from the owner’s family...
...energy use and greenhouse emissions more then double by 2050...

phrases.pCn: n. 二氧化碳、甲烷等导致温室效应的气体

remMethod.val: green(绿色的) ＋ house(房子) → 温室

trans.tranOther: a glass building used for growing plants that need warmth, light, and protection
